title: abhaya karathai
sahitya:
abhaya karattai pArta pOdE accam ozhindEn shivanE un



anupallavi



udaya pAdam paTrum anbar uyyak-karuNai peyyum tuyyA



caraNam



kuncita pada nizhalinil iDam koDuttE kOpap-pAsham vIshum

kUTrait-taDuttE

anjal anjal enrE shenshilambaDigaL Arkka naTamADum AnandamE un
